verses.html:
1
Hallelujah, Amen!
Gifts we bring to Thee alone;
Lord, we adore Thee, Kneeling now,
here before Thy throne;
Oh, wondrous Saviour, Who will reign forever!

2
Hallelujah, Amen!
To the Holy Lord we sing!
All comes from Thee, O Loving Father,
let praises ring!
Oh, wondrous Saviour, Who will reign forever!
